BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20135524 HAX submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD) for approval of an Urban Development Action Area Project and related tax exemption for property located at 847 Fox Street, Borough of Bronx, Community Board 2, Council District 17. This matter is subject to Council review and action at the request of HPD and pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law and Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Planning, UDAAP - 847 Fox St, Bronx (20135524 HAX)
